history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00523
FULL TITLE : AN ACT ESTABLISHING THE FILIPINO IDENTIFICATION SYSTEM
SHORT TITLE : Filipino Identification System Act
ABSTRACT : Establishes an effective identification system to facilitate transactions with the government and to simplify the processes relative to public and private services.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : GARBIN, ALFREDO JR. A., BATOCABE, RODEL M., CO, CHRISTOPHER S.
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Salceda (008 2016-08-09)2. Violago (080 2017-03-08)
